tutorials.title: Getting a Cloud Trial
tutorials.description: Get a free Cloud Account to perform this lab.

tutorials.title: Lab 50: Provisioning VBCS
tutorials.description: Learn how to provision the Visual Builder Cloud Service.

tutorials.title: Lab 100: Creating a Application
tutorials.description: Learn how to create a Visual Builder application and add business data to display.

tutorials.title: Lab 200: Adding, Update and Editing Pages
tutorials.description: This lab will walk you through adding, updating and editing web pages to your application.

tutorials.title: Lab 300: Creating a Mobile Application
tutorials.description: This lab will walk you through creating a mobile application and displaying an inventory list.

tutorials.title: Lab 400: Incorporating REST Data into the Application
tutorials.description: Learn how to create a mobile application page for viewing an inventory item's details and incorporate data from a REST service.
